text: I mostly agree but there are small use cases where css vars fall short, eg. I wanted to set media query vars, so we could easily change the breakpoints for a whole theme, you can’t put a css var in a media query max width, whereas you could add hubl, also hubl allows for writing macros which is sometimes quite useful in css
Is there a way to add a custom class to each of my pages built using a template?

Hi, does anyone know how to get data from hubdb to custom module? I have a table with 100 entries, each entry will show if the active page check-box is checked and order number from 1-100. My problem is when i set the limit=3 the data are not showing. I choose no. 59,78,89 from the table.
I don't know if this will help you, but you can use {{name}} variable in module, this is uniqe for every instance of module.
